lyrics:
6 contributorsdone with you lyricsverse 1
i count the days that we have spent apart
ive got a bad liver and a broken heart
theres no salvation in the comfort of you
i finally realized youre tearing me apart

chorus
so help me save me tell me that the end is near
help me save me tell me that the end is near
i am done with you

verse 2
you made my life completely miserable
you drove me to the edge youve caused me all this pain
but ive always loved you cause youre oh so special
im broken and im alone and i cannot maintain

chorus
so help me save me tell me that the end is near
help me save me tell me that the end is near
i am done with you

bridge
done with you done with you
i am done with you done with youx2
i am done with you done with you im done with you
i count the days that we have spent apart
ive got a bad liver and a broken heart
you might also likechorus
so help me save me tell me that the end is near
help me save me tell me that the end is near
i am done with you

verse 3
because you and me are through
you couldnt help me
you couldnt save me
now i know the end is here
i am done with youembed
